mapper.sql: id, cust_name, sex, job_title, phone_num, address, trade, source, level, mark, staff_id, last_contact_time, create_time, update_time, reminder
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from customer
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into customer (id, cust_name, sex, job_title, phone_num, address, trade, source, level, mark, staff_id, last_contact_time, create_time, update_time, reminder ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastContactTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reminder,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

id,
cust_name,

phone_num,
address,

mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y年%m月') AS 'months', COUNT(*) AS 'increase' FROM customer GROUP BY months
